question: The European Unionâ€™s Sakharov Prize 2020 has been awarded to the opposition movement of which country?
explanation:
The European Parliament has awarded the Sakharov Prize for human rights to the Belarusian movement opposing President Alexander Lukashenko.
The opposition movement was led by the exiled Svetlana Tikhanovskaya. The EU also had agreed to impose sanctions against officials suspected of involvement in a security crackdown on protesters in Belarus.
